explains: v. 鼓动，煽动（暴力或非法行为）

sentences.en: The parliament also agreed to ban websites that "incite excessive thinness" by promoting extreme dieting.
sentences.cn: 议会还同意禁止通过推广极端节食来“煽动过度瘦身”的网站。

sentences.en: The party agreed not to incite its supporters to violence.
sentences.cn: 该党同意不再鼓动其支持者使用暴力。

sentences.en: Just a few words will incite him into action.
sentences.cn: 他只需几句话一将，就会干。
